name: Johnathan Gold & Guilded Hearts
bio: Johnathan Gold brings heartland truths with raw emotion, balancing modern country roots and bold lyrical honesty.

name: Kaira Heartfelt
bio: Kaira Heartfelt delivers emotionally charged pop anthems with electronic undertones that resonate with the soul.

name: Mathew Cage
bio: Mathew Cage delivers powerful rock anthems that challenge conventions and speak truth to power.

name: Chronix
bio: Chronix creates immersive electronic soundscapes that transport listeners through time and space.

name: Daina Vein
bio: Daina Vein delivers explosive electronic intensity with raw emotional power. Each track ignites with industrial beats and ethereal vocals.
